articles.author: Stephan Shemilt
articles.title: 'English cricket must do without Anderson' - Key
articles.description: Rob Key says English cricket will "have to do without Jimmy Anderson" after the fast bowler calls time on his legendary career against West Indies at Lord's in July.
articles.content:
Key discussed the future of Ollie Robinson, who possesses a one-year central contract, but had a disappointing tour of India.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Plans approved for £61.8m redevelopment of Lord's
articles.description: Plans for a £61.8m redevelopment of two stands at Lord's are approved by the Marylebone Cricket Club's members.
articles.content:
Plans for a £61.8m redevelopment of two stands at Lord's have been approved.
The work, voted through by Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC) members last week, will increase the ground's capacity by 1,100 … [+622 chars]

articles.title: BBC signs new four-year audio deal for ICC events
articles.description: The BBC signs a new four-year audio deal with the International Cricket Council (ICC) to broadcast all major global tournaments.
articles.content:
The BBC has signed a new four-year audio deal with the International Cricket Council (ICC) to broadcast all major global tournaments.
